00036 #include <fm_demod.h>
00037 
00038 /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00039 
00040 /* private to FM */
00041 
00042 /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00043 
00044 PRIVATE void init_pll( FMD fm, REAL samprate, REAL freq, REAL lofreq,
00045                        REAL hifreq, REAL bandwidth )
00046 {
00047     REAL fac = ( REAL ) ( TWOPI / samprate );
00048 
00049     fm->pll.freq.f = freq * fac;
00050     fm->pll.freq.l = lofreq * fac;
00051     fm->pll.freq.h = hifreq * fac;
00052     fm->pll.phs = 0.0;
00053     fm->pll.delay = cxJ;
00054 
00055     fm->pll.iir.alpha = bandwidth * fac;    /* arm filter */
00056     fm->pll.alpha = fm->pll.iir.alpha * 0.3;    /* pll bandwidth */
00057     fm->pll.beta = fm->pll.alpha * fm->pll.alpha * 0.25;    /* second order term */
00058 }
00059 
00060 PRIVATE void pll( FMD fm, COMPLEX sig )
00061 {
00062     COMPLEX z =
00063         Cmplx( ( REAL ) cos( fm->pll.phs ), ( IMAG ) sin( fm->pll.phs ) );
00064     REAL diff;
00065 
00066     fm->pll.delay.re = z.re * sig.re + z.im * sig.im;
00067     fm->pll.delay.im = -z.im * sig.re + z.re * sig.im;
00068     diff = ATAN2( fm->pll.delay.im, fm->pll.delay.re );
00069 
00070     fm->pll.freq.f += fm->pll.beta * diff;
00071 
00072     if ( fm->pll.freq.f < fm->pll.freq.l )
00073         fm->pll.freq.f = fm->pll.freq.l;
00074     if ( fm->pll.freq.f > fm->pll.freq.h )
00075         fm->pll.freq.f = fm->pll.freq.h;
00076 
00077     fm->pll.phs += fm->pll.freq.f + fm->pll.alpha * diff;
00078 
00079     while ( fm->pll.phs >= TWOPI )
00080         fm->pll.phs -= ( REAL ) TWOPI;
00081     while ( fm->pll.phs < 0 )
00082         fm->pll.phs += ( REAL ) TWOPI;
00083 }
00084 
00085 /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00086 
00087 /* public */
00088 
00089 /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00090 
00091 void FMDemod( FMD fm )
00092 {
00093     int i;
00094 
00095     for ( i = 0; i < CXBsize( fm->ibuf ); i++ )
00096     {
00097         pll( fm, CXBdata( fm->ibuf, i ) );
00098         fm->afc = ( REAL ) ( 0.9999 * fm->afc + 0.0001 * fm->pll.freq.f );
00099         CXBreal( fm->obuf, i ) = CXBimag( fm->obuf, i ) =
00100             ( fm->pll.freq.f - fm->afc ) * fm->cvt;
00101     }
00102 }
00103 
00104 FMD newFMD( REAL samprate, REAL f_initial, REAL f_lobound, REAL f_hibound,
00105             REAL f_bandwid, int size, COMPLEX * ivec, COMPLEX * ovec,
00106             char *tag )
00107 {
00108     FMD fm = ( FMD ) safealloc( 1, sizeof( FMDDesc ), tag );
00109 
00110     fm->size = size;
00111     fm->ibuf = newCXB( size, ivec, tag );
00112     fm->obuf = newCXB( size, ovec, tag );
00113 
00114     init_pll( fm, samprate, f_initial, f_lobound, f_hibound, f_bandwid );
00115 
00116     fm->lock = 0.5;
00117     fm->afc = 0.0;
00118     fm->cvt = ( REAL ) ( 0.45 * samprate / ( M_PI * f_bandwid ) );
00119 
00120     return fm;
00121 }
00122 
00123 void delFMD( FMD fm )
00124 {
00125     if ( fm )
00126     {
00127         delCXB( fm->ibuf );
00128         delCXB( fm->obuf );
00129         safefree( ( char * ) fm );
00130     }
00131 }
